title: Watch Bernie Sanders’ Best Moments From The First Dem Debate
text:

Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.) took a break from live-tweeting and participated in his first Democratic presidential primary debate Tuesday night. 
Sanders, who calls himself a “Democratic socialist,” came out swinging and took jabs at former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton over reforming Wall Street and debated former Maryland Gov. Martin O’Malley (D) on gun control. 
Take a look at Bernie Sanders’ highlight moments above.
